Text: Thanks a lot. This band is the best spanish pop band ever. Intenationally acclaimed I think this is their accolade album. I think Prince drummer was hired to play in this album. One of their finest albums. Highly recommended.

According to cd's booklet, drummer Ian Thomas played in several songs.

Regarding styles, Presuntos Implicados is a unique band in the Spanish-language music. No other pop band in the Spanish-speaking world has made their very particular combinations with influences from ballads, funk, soul, blues, Latin jazz, folk, etc. And their original "formula" is delightful.
